title: Alternative to Bliss or Corporate E
content:
Hi there,  
I wonder if anyone can recomend a font that is easy to work with and could be used both in headlines as well as in body copy?

What I am after is a sans serif or maybe a slab serif that has a both contemporary and human look and comes in many weights. That last thing is really important and it is also there almost all of the ones I find fail.

I have tried Bliss and Corporate E but I would like to find and try another options.

/Rika
author: Rika

comments.content:
I forgot to mention this, but there has to be a light weight of the font.

Any suggestions someone??
